text: Get on the Bus Singel Destiny's Child featuring Timbaland from the album Why Do Fools Fall in Love OST & The Writing's on the Wall (International Edition) Released 23 February 1999r. Genre R&B; Length 4:44 Label Columbia Records Writer Tim Mosley, Missy Elliott Producer Timbaland Destiny's Child singles chronology With me (1998r.) Get on the Bus Bills, Bills, Bills (1999r.) Timbaland singles chronology Here We Come (1999r.) Get on the Bus Ugly (2000r.) The Writing's on the Wall CD track listing Outro (16) Get on the Bus (17) "Get on the Bus" was the third single from girl group Destiny's Child. The song featured rapper/producer Timbaland and is lifted from the original motion picture soundtrack of Why Do Fools Fall in Love (1998). It was the second single to be lifted from the soundtrack following Melanie B's debut single, "I Want You Back". Produced by Timbaland, it peaked at number twelve on the UK and Netherlands charts, and at number sixty on the German chart. The single was not commercially released in the U.S. and other major markets, It did receive some minor US Urban radio airplay, peaking at #58 on the US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Airplay chart. The music video was directed by Earle Sebastian. == Track listingUK single == #"Get on the Bus" (radio version) (featuring Timbaland) #"Get on the Bus" (radio edit without rap) #"Illusions" (Destiny Club Mix) == Credits and personnel == * Lead vocals: Beyoncé Knowles, Kelly Rowland * Vocal production - Beyoncé Knowles, Kelly Rowland, Timbaland == Charts == Chart (1998/1999) Peak position UK Singles Chart 12 US Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Airplay 58 == References == Category:Destiny's Child songs Category:1999 songs
title: Get on the Bus
